name: Drag Racing Reflex Challenge
description:
Get Ready to be Attentive. You have to keep your eyes and mind attentive...
wait wait....Don't blink your eyes.... Signal is about to be green...you have to response in decimal seconds.. Even if you are mili second late you are gone.. you will be the loser...
Would you have a courage to accept the challenge?
Yes?
Download this game and keep your ming active...
And if you like the game...
Don't forget to rate the game.
